006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * Performs post-processing on a loaded module.
015 *
016 * @since 2.0.0
017 */
018public interface ModuleLoadingPostProcessor {
019  /**
020   * Post-processes the provided Metaschema module.
021   *
022   * @param module
023   *          the Module module to generate classes for
024   * @param bindingContext
025   *          the Metaschema binding context used to load bound resources
026   * @since 2.0.0
027   */
028  void postProcessModule(
029      @NonNull IModule module,
030      @NonNull IBindingContext bindingContext);
031}
